body: Hi Massome, If you try the latest version of Honeybee addHBGlz accepts list of constructions and also names! [Here is a Hydra that shows the process](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Mutiple_constructions_and_names_for_windows).
